  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final long
    status
    A long giving the current recording status, must be either Status.RECORDING, Status.PAUSED or Status.INACTIVE.
    final long
    type
    A long giving the type of the recording device, must be either Type.CAMERA or Type.MICROPHONE.
